We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private Maximum _max;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_max = MAX(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_max.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "MAX Periods Since Maximum", _max.PeriodsSinceMaximum);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MAX Period", _max.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "MAX Current", _max.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.max = self.MAX(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.max.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MAX Periods Since Maximum", self.max.PeriodsSinceMaximum);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MAX Period", self.max.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "MAX Current", self.max.Current);
